name: Fishing Trainer
description:
Hit Run Game to practice catching fish in Stardew Valley!

The fishing mechanic can be punishing to new players, so I wanted to find a way to help others practice. Try catching fish of different difficulties, and adjust the settings to whatever you feel matches your experience.

If you have suggestions for things that could be added to this tool, let me know in the comments below, although I do plan to keep it as simple as possible. Thank you for checking it out!

Code: https://github.com/erdavids/Stardew-Valley-Fishing-Trainer
